attributes.action: Ensure that every car parking space is at least a certain size.
attributes.additional_details: Vote to legalize minimum car park space sizes that ensure each and every car parking space is big enough so that passengers and drivers can easily get in and out of their car. It’s time to remove the stress of parking and make parking easy especially as cars are getting bigger - not smaller.
attributes.background: Have you struggled to get out of your car because the car parking spaces are too small? Have you suffered from dents & scratches to your vehicle while your car is parked in a car park? Have you struggled to reverse out of a car park space because it’s too crammed? Change is needed!
